Starring: Johnny Depp, Marlon Brando, Marshall Bell, Elpidia Carrillo, Floyd 'Red Crow' Westerman
Directed by: Johnny Depp 

Hard to believe, but here's a movie that:

 - Stars Johnny Depp
 - Is the only movie Johnny Depp ever directed
 - Co-stars Marlon Brando in one of his final performances

... and yet few have ever seen it, or even heard of it. This is because Johnny Depp barred it from release in North America (thus explaining the PAL source) after poor reviews at Cannes. Well, here it is. It isn't his best work (it's adapted from a novel by the way) but it isn't that bad, other than the somewhat implausible story. Hope you enjoy it.
